author: kfogel
msg: * CHANGES: Bring up to date for Alpha.

author: kfogel
msg: Patch from Blair.  Applying this with Ben's agreement, since it won't
conflict with his local mods.
* doc/handbook/client.texi:
(Tracking an externally maintained project on a vendor branch):
Add missing @samp to fix a makeinfo error.

author: blair
msg: * doc/handbook/client.texi:
(svn:keywords): The replacement $LastChangedRev$ was listed instead
of $LastChangedRevision$.  Use the new date format for the example
$LastChangedDate$ keyword substitution.  Add sample replacement
text so that people can see what the replacements look like.
(Tracking an externally maintained project on a vendor branch):
Include documentation about svn_load_dirs.pl.  Reorder an example
import command to be easier to follow.
* doc/README:
Do not link to texinfo-4.0.tar.gz directly on GNU's FTP site.
Instead, tell the user to use the latest texinfo in the FTP
directory.  Use consistent ` and ' quoting.

author: kfogel
msg: * subversion/libsvn_ra_dav/fetch.c: Holy cow.  How did an "es" creep
into the top of this file?  Probably a typing-too-fast editor
blooper on my part -- Emacs must have prompted me with a y-or-n-p,
and I assumed it was a yes-or-no-p, so the final "es" just got
inserted at point-min.  Yeeks.

author: kfogel
msg: Use "-R" instead of "--recursive", and "-N" instead of "-n".
Suggested by: Eric Gillespie <epg@pretzelnet.org>
* subversion/clients/cmdline/main.c
(svn_cl__options, svn_cl__cmd_table): Use -R and -N now.
(main): Look for 'R' and 'N' when parsing options.
* subversion/clients/cmdline/cl.h
(svn_cl__longopt_t): Remove `svn_cl__recursive_opt'.
* subversion/tests/clients/cmdline/getopt_tests_data/svn_help_log_switch_stdout
Change -n to -N.
* subversion/tests/clients/cmdline/diff_tests.py
(diff_non_recursive): Change -n to -N.
